casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL
v.
POOLEY 2018-1282 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 21, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

DISCIPLINARY CASES

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Fischer, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

On certified order of the United States District Court for the District of Colorado, No. 17-DP-5. Christopher Jonathan Pooley, Attorney Registration No. 0068799, last known business address in Avon, Colorado, publicly reprimanded.

Kennedy, French, and DeWine, JJ., dissent and would dismiss the cause.
